name: Joined Reflection
description:
The WebGL build has been disabled due to a game-breaking bug present after the 2nd stage. The Windows build is still mostly functional. I apologize for the inconvenience.

Controls:
WASD to move
Left mouse button to link with your tome
Right mouse button to create a static link point

Join together link points to reflect incoming projectiles! Activate all power altars to open up the gates to the next floor. Beware sorcerers that inhabit the lower levels, for you have no attacks of your own...
